content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with you! It's crucial for cities to recognize and celebrate the diversity of their residents and work towards creating equitable service delivery models to ensure that everyone can access essential services. By adopting inclusive and equitable practices, cities can foster a sense of community and belonging, and create a more just and equitable society for all. So, it's great to see Brampton taking steps towards being more inclusive, and I hope that more cities follow their example in addressing issues of equity and inclusivity in the provision of regional services.
